title: Silver duos/lessening the pain
body:
Looking for someone to duo queue with, solo queueing is painful as fuck and having someone who will communicate with would be helpful,

Mainly looking for someone who will be happy to get on teamspeak or something similar (fuck skype). I mainly play adc but will play anywhere or alternate positions with someone.

replies.body: Hey I have curse and I main support but can play everywhere, willing to learn some stuff too but as many people don't take kindly to flaming, toxic duo partners. add me if interested :)

Hey man i don't have mic but i main supp and just lost 4 ranked games in a row... rly salty right now.Want someone reliable to duo Q with, add me if u want to Duo Q. I play soraka now---------BANANA FTW.{{champion:16}}
